Class GridConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • GridConverter
  • public class GridConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of methods allowing for the conversion between grid coordinates (the index "coordinates" of an object in the 2d array, representing which square the object is in) and world coordinates (the coordinates of said object in the world, in pixels)
    Version:
    June 2021
    Author:
    Quinton Mak

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GridConverter()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static int[] gridToWorld​(int xGrid, int yGrid)
      Converts between grid coordinates to world coordinates, assuming the location of the origin is retained
      static int[] worldToGrid​(int xWorld, int yWorld)
      Converts between world coordinates to grid coordinates, assuming the location of the origin is retained
      static int[] worldToSquareWorld​(int xWorld, int yWorld)
      Converts world coordinates to the coordinatees of the nearest square

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • gridToWorld

        public static int[] gridToWorld​(int xGrid,
                                int yGrid)
        Converts between grid coordinates to world coordinates, assuming the location of the origin is retained
        Parameters:
        xGrid - the first index of the object in the 2d grid array
        yGrid - the second index of the object in the 2d grid array

      • worldToGrid

        public static int[] worldToGrid​(int xWorld,
                                int yWorld)
        Converts between world coordinates to grid coordinates, assuming the location of the origin is retained
        Parameters:
        xWorld - the x coordinate of the object in the world
        yWorld - the x coordinate of the object in the world

      • worldToSquareWorld

        public static int[] worldToSquareWorld​(int xWorld,
                                       int yWorld)
        Converts world coordinates to the coordinatees of the nearest square
